repliesModal.buttonText: Add this response to the response section of this article

relatedReplies.buttonText: Add this response to the response section of this article

replyComponent.descriptionTextLink: Description text for hyperlink and link

desc.NOT_ARTICLE: This article cannot be handled by editor or Cofacts should not handle this type of article
desc.OPINIONATED: Forwarded message or article is partially verified
desc.NOT_RUMOR: Forwarded message or article contains personal opinion, hypothesis, conspiracy theories, research findings yet to reach consensus, policy inference, etc.
desc.RUMOR: Forwarded message or article contains misinformation

instruction.NOT_ARTICLE: Please explain briefly why you believe this article is incomplete
instruction.NOT_RUMOR: Please explain briefly which part is correct or verified so as to provide reference to data source
instruction.OPINIONATED: Please explain briefly which part contains subjective opinion and remind other readers it is not an objective fact
instruction.RUMOR: Please explain briefly which part is inaccurate so as to provide reference to data source

opinion1.label: Conspiracy
opinion1.value: … of the article contains conspiracy theories that cannot be verified because…

opinion2.label: Fallacy
opinion2.value: … of the article contains fallacy because…

opinion3.label: Lack of consensus
opinion3.value: There is still no consensus in the society in regards to … of the article

opinion4.label: Personal values
opinion4.value: … of the article is only personal views instead of objective fact

not_article1.label: Text too short
not_article1.value: The length of the text is too short. It is suspected to be a query generated by user instead of article forwarded

not_article2.label: Commercial promotion
not_article2.value: This is a commercial advertisement. The activity period is …

not_article3.label: No need verification
not_article3.value: The information is not related to rumours

not_article4.label: Chat
not_article4.value: User forwarding article is trying to chat with chatbot
